description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Accelerate 2016
https://gotocon.com/accelerate-2016

Adrian Cockcroft - Technology Fellow at Battery Ventures, spent his career at the leading edge

ABSTRACT
What does it mean to be simple or complicated? How can we manage complexity when we scale up systems? It's Simple...
Why do people find it horrifying [...]
